name: Attic (itch) (violinistsMetronome)
description:
Note: the browser version's screen is a bit small, so it's recommended to zoom the page in at least 200% (ctrl++ on most browsers).  Also I forgot to put the credits in the game, sorry.

Made with RPG Maker MV.
